about_the_game:
Egg Summoner is an exciting clicker game where players step into the world of egg summoning and discovery. Engage in the thrill of summoning magical eggs, each with its own unique contents waiting to be unveiled. The anticipation builds as you crack open each egg, revealing a variety of valuable items that can be traded on the market. Dive into this addictive gameplay loop, combining elements of chance, strategy, and commerce.

Key Features:

Summon and Open Eggs: Experience the excitement of summoning eggs with mysterious contents.
Unique Items: Discover a wide range of items, from common to rare, each with its own value and use.
Marketplace: Trade your discovered items in the marketplace.
Engaging Gameplay Loop: Enjoy the addictive cycle of summoning, discovering, and trading.
Stunning Visuals: Delight in beautifully crafted eggs and item designs.
Strategic Decisions: Decide which eggs to summon and when to trade.

Design:

Egg Summoner is a pixel based summoning game. The game’s design focuses on a clean and intuitive interface, making it easy for players of all ages to jump in and start summoning. Here are some highlights of our game design:

Egg Summoning: Watch a short animation as your egg is summoned from the void, adding to the excitement and anticipation.
Opening Mechanic: Enjoy the tactile experience of cracking open eggs to reveal their contents, with detailed animations and effects.
Item Showcase: Each item discovered is showcased with high-quality visuals and detailed descriptions.
User Interface: The overall UI is designed to be user-friendly, ensuring that players can navigate through summoning, inventory, and marketplace screens effortlessly.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.6, and above
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any

name: Egg Summoner

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: any
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Egg Summoner is a clicker game where you summon and open magical eggs! Crack open each egg to discover unique items that you can trade on the market. Com hang out with us on the discord and let's hatch something BIG!
